casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Sonya Case HARRIS. No. 25P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Joseph Finarelli, Assistant Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Sonya Case Harris.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of January 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."

Upon consideration of the cross petition filed on the 25th day of January 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."
